name: MOTUM Brain Tumor MRI
description: Multi-center, multi-origin brain tumor MRI. 67 patients (gliomas + metastases). Four MRI sequences with two segmentation label regions merged into a 3-class mask.
citation: Gong Z. et al. A Multi-Center, Multi-Parametric MRI Dataset of Primary and Secondary Brain Tumors. Harvard Dataverse (2023). doi:10.7910/DVN/KUUEWC
